full_summary:
**Solicitation for User Experience and User Interface Testing Services**
===========================================

Title
--------

W8474-248487: User Experience (UX), User Interface (UI) and Accessibility Testing Services

Reference Number
----------------

cb-459-40912983

Description
------------

National Defence is soliciting services to support the evaluation of proposals for a future Electronic Health Record (EHR) system. The contractor will assist in developing the point-rated evaluation criteria and weighting rationale for usability (UX and UI) and conformity to Government of Canada accessibility and Official Languages standards.

Key Objectives
---------------

- Evaluate the top two (2) ranked bids for their technical merit.
- Conduct user experience (UX) and user interface (UI) testing to confirm vendor claims of accessibility, functionality, and compliance with relevant Government of Canada guidelines.
- Provide scoring results based on the point-rated criteria.

Scope of Work
-------------

- Develop point-rated evaluation criteria and weighting rationale for UX and UI analysis.
- Conduct usability testing and reviews of bid proposals.
- Assess accessibility and Official Languages compliance.

Eligibility
------------

This procurement is open to all qualified contractors. Note that amendments to this request for proposals (RFP) have been made, and all interested parties are expected to review the revised terms and conditions.

Document Attachments
-------------------

The following documents are available for reference:
- W8474-248487-ux-ui---npp-en.pdf
- W8474-248487-ux-ui---rfp-en.pdf
- W8474-248487-ux-ui-amendment-002-en.pdf
- W8474-248487-ux-ui-amendment-001-en.pdf

Contact Information
-------------------

For further information, please contact Alex Cochran at:

Phone: (343) 548-7265
